Item 8.01 - Other Events.content: On July 24, 2023, JPMorgan Chase & Co. closed public offerings of $2,000,000,000 aggregate principal amount of Fixed-to-FloatingRate Notes due 2034 (the “2034 Notes”) and $2,500,000,000 aggregate principal amount of Fixed-to-FloatingRate Notes due 2029 (together with the 2034 Notes, the “Notes”). The 2034 Notes are an additional issuance of, and constitute a single series with, the $2,500,000,000 aggregate principal amount of Fixed-to-FloatingRate Notes due 2034 issued by JPMorgan Chase & Co. on June 1, 2023. The Notes were registered under the Securities Act of 1933, as amended, pursuant to a registration statement on Form S-3(File No. 333-263304),as amended. In connection with these offerings, the legal opinion as to the legality of the Notes is being filed as Exhibit 5.1 to this report.
